title: Be Part of the Story (LIVE from NYC)
description: DeRay, Brittany and Sam, with special guest Rembert Browne, are live from NYC opening the NYC Podfest to talk about the NFL, the Flint water crisis, and Facebook. Touré joins DeRay for an interview about interviews, including R. Kelly and Kanye.
author: hey@crooked.com (Crooked Media)
